unnormalised: My grandma, Lakshmi Amma, swears by Ayurvedic treatments. Last Onam, she couldn't even walk properly, her knee pain was that bad! After a month at the Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala, spending around Rs. 20,000, she was dancing! Now, she walks 2 km every morning. She says it's better than any biryani for her well-being!
normalised: My grandma, Lakshmi Amma, swears by Ayurvedic treatments. Last Onam, she couldn't even walk properly, her knee pain was that bad! After a month at the Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala, spending around rupees twenty thousand, she was dancing! Now, she walks two kilometer every morning. She says it's better than any biryani for her well-being!
